sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: RAHABEK a village in the desert part of Irak Arabia, near the Euphrates, on the road frequented by the caravans from Syria to Irak Arabia, 110 miles south-west of Mosul. Also a village of Diarbekir in Asiatic Turkey, on the Euphrates, fifty miles south of Kerkesich.
